title: BLE Peripheral Component
description: Handles Bluetooth Low Energy peripheral operations including characteristic reads, writes, and value updates. Manages BLE service discovery and communication with connected devices.

title: Sensor Connection Generator
description: Manages sensor connection lifecycle, configuration, and state tracking. Handles pairing, configuration, and connection status for sensors.

title: Sensor Life State
description: Tracks sensor lifecycle states including configuration, expiration, errors, and calibration status. Manages sensor state transitions and validation.

title: Time Change Service
description: Handles time synchronization and timezone adjustments for sensors. Manages time change calculations and session timing.

title: BLE Service
description: Main BLE service component that coordinates sensor connections, manages service discovery, and updates sensor state. Handles BLE-specific operations.
